title: Average ticket price Orlando Magic ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2011/12, and finally slightly decreasing from 2011/12 to 2013/14.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 43.65 was reported at Year 2011/12
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 39.4 was reported at Year 2013/14
